mapper.sql: USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, USER_CODE, USER_CNAME, USER_TNAME, USER_ENAME, PASSWORD, SALT, SEAL, PASSWORD_SET_DATE, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE, COMPANY_CODE, PHONE, MOBILE, ADDRESS, POST_CODE, EMAIL, VALID_FLAG, FLAG,REMARK
mapper.select:
select
from app_user
1=1
AND a.USER_CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userCname},'%')
AND a.USER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userCode},'%')
AND a.USER_TNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userTname},'%')
limit #{iDisplayStart},#{iDisplayLength}

select count(1) FROM APP_USER a
1=1
AND a.USER_CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userCname},'%')
AND a.USER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userCode},'%')
AND a.USER_TNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userTname},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into app_user ( USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, USER_CODE, USER_CNAME, USER_TNAME, USER_ENAME, PASSWORD, SALT, SEAL, PASSWORD_SET_DATE, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE, COMPANY_CODE, PHONE, MOBILE, ADDRESS, POST_CODE, EMAIL, VALID_FLAG, FLAG, REMARK ) values ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordSetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{passwordExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update app_user
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CNAME = #{userCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TNAME = #{userTname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ENAME = #{userEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEAL = #{seal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD_SET_DATE = #{passwordSetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE = #{passwordExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_FLAG = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update app_user set CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CNAME = #{userCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TNAME = #{userTname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ENAME = #{userEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEAL = #{seal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD_SET_DATE = #{passwordSetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE = #{passwordExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_FLAG = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
